## useScrollToLastMessage() function

Scroll the messsages container to the top of the last message whenever there's an update to the messages state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useScrollToLastMessage(): [
    React.RefObject<HTMLDivElement>,
    (index: number) => ((message: HTMLDivElement) => void) | undefined
];
```
**Returns:**

\[ React.RefObject&lt;HTMLDivElement&gt;, (index: number) =&gt; ((message: HTMLDivElement) =&gt; void) \| undefined \]

a ref to set on the messages container element and a function to set ref on individual message element
